>
[Snowcaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=4097) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Gelid Shard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=201)

</column>

---

Your magical power grows as the shard's icy influence spreads ever deeper into your being. You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from this archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell level (including heightened versions of lower-level spells) to your repertoire, either a common spell of the [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) tradition that has the [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) trait or another cold spell you have access to.
